database-object.create: CREATE VIEW [dbo].[viewCustomersWithToyProducts] AS SELECT DISTINCT c.CustomerId, c.Firstname, c.Lastname, o.OrderId, o.OrderDate FROM dbo.Customer AS c INNER JOIN dbo.[Order] AS o ON c.CustomerId = o.Customer INNER JOIN dbo.OrderProduct AS op ON o.OrderId = op.[Order] INNER JOIN dbo.Product AS p ON op.Product = p.ProductId WHERE (p.Name = 'toys') GROUP BY c.CustomerId, c.Firstname, c.Lastname, o.OrderId, o.OrderDate
